useTranslations.title: useTranslations()
useTranslations.description: Use `useTranslations` in Client Components to get the `t()` function from a namespace — with autocomplete and type checking by TypeScript — making interpolation, pluralization, and rendering on the client easy.

getTranslations.title: getTranslations()
getTranslations.description: Use `getTranslations` in Server Components or Server Actions to load namespaces on the server (useful in SSR and server actions). Returns an asynchronous version of `t()` ready for use in server-side rendering and actions.

namespaces.title: Namespaces
namespaces.description: Organize messages into namespaces (e.g., `global`, `admin.userManagement`) for modularity and reuse. Combine namespaces in the component when necessary to compose context-specific translations.

pluralization.title: Pluralization
pluralization.description: Use ICU rules to handle plurals and numerical variations (e.g., =0 {nenhum}, one {1}, other {#}), ensuring that grammatical forms are correct according to quantity.

interpolation.title: Interpolation
interpolation.description: Insert placeholders (e.g., `{name}`) into messages and pass values to `t()` to interpolate dynamic content in a typed and secure manner.

dateFormatting.title: Date/Number Formatting
dateFormatting.description: Format dates and numbers using `Intl.DateTimeFormat` and `Intl.NumberFormat`, respecting the active locale and regional conventions.

title: Translation Methods
description: Examples and best practices for internationalization with next-intl: typing, automation, and quality validation.
